Data from: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/NUFORC/ufo-sightings

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)

ufo <- read_csv(here("C:/Users/tomas/Documents", "scrubbed.csv")) |> clean_names()

us <- map_data("state")
ggplot(ufo, aes(longitude, latitude)) + geom_point()

```

```{r}
ufous <- ufo |> filter(country == "us")
ggplot(ufous, aes(longitude, latitude)) + geom_point()
```
